Articles.Content:
[sOON TO BE LUNATIC AEROSPACE]

With the help of ximrm we now have the model, I'm soon to be working on the .cfg!

Refuel Probe: A aero dynamically slick refuel probe that could be placed and when toggled extends out and acts as a docking port; very small, and a bucket type system that could be added on to a KAS pipe, like so;

UPDATE! We have animated parts! http://i.imgur.com/t1KFoXf.gif

Please leave all credit to ximrm, he has done all the modelling, animations, and is working on the texturing and unity import; this mod was my idea, however he made my dreams come alive!

Edited September 7, 2014 by JazeEyed
Update!
This is really great! But I would suggest you make it like the claw part in ksp where it hooks into anywhere.
Looks good, but how exactly are there going to be two planes flying at the same time able to dock?
There are several options: Multiplayer, Mechjeb, kOS, persistent trails etc.

Looks good!

Thanks! There has been some great work from ximrm! Kudos to him!

This is really great! But I would suggest you make it like the claw part in ksp where it hooks into anywhere.

Well I'd rather it was a docking type part, it seems easer and would be a little more real, instead of just 'hitting' the part and connecting it has to be carefully docked, this could also be used with the various docking mods!

Looks good, but how exactly are there going to be two planes flying at the same time able to dock?
There are several options: Multiplayer, Mechjeb, kOS, persistent trails etc.

Yep! Also BahumatoD's Burn Together mod!

There are several options: Multiplayer, Mechjeb, kOS, persistent trails etc.

That reminds me, would you like to test this mod (once in a usable state) on multiplayer with myself?

Sadly unity does not allow point animations, so I rigged the whole thing.

Newer version, still not final, animation will be tweaked,textures , collider coming.

In my defense... I'm not an animator, i do mainly modelling and sculpting.

BTW: haven't tried Multiplayer yet, but sure.

Edited September 2, 2014 by ximrm

Not only for planes, also tiny satellites.

This is also useful for ships/planes that don't/can't have a normal docking port and can use the (coming)antenna-like part to refuel.

Well I'd rather it was a docking type part, it seems easer and would be a little more real, instead of just 'hitting' the part and connecting it has to be carefully docked, this could also be used with the various docking mods!

Well, docking in air would be tough. A claw mode would be better, you could also have the part swivel on multiple axises.

Hah, probe-drogue, not that cheaty Air Force stuff

Doing this in atmo is going to be very tough (you'll need one heck of a stable tanker) but you could maybe get ferram to enable pitch/yaw dampening and wing leveler for uncontrolled craft.

That's right, I've always liked a realistic feel to my aircraft, so I though this would be a great way to end all the air to air refuelling fails!

However the only point hindering us now is the Unity Import, Unity doesn't work with my current setup and my partner has done enough work so we are stuck for now, however if anyone can help please private message me!
Bump! This mod may be up in 2/3 weeks! (hopefully!)
Moderators, please could you delete this thread?
